thread.title: Kraft Heinz Expands Voluntary Recall of Kraft Singles Over Choking Hazard
thread.title_full: Kraft Heinz Expands Voluntary Recall of Kraft Singles Over Choking Hazard - WSJ

author: Maria Armental
title: Kraft Heinz Expands Voluntary Recall of Kraft Singles Over Choking Hazard
text:
Kraft Heinz Co. has expanded a voluntary recall of Kraft Singles cheese slices following two additional choking complaints, the company said Thursday.
The expanded recall affects about 335,000 additional cases of Kraft Singles shipped in the U.S. and abroad, the company said.
The initial recall, issued on July 31, applied to about...
